mapper.insert:
select SEQ_G_TRAN.NEXTVAL as ID from DUAL
insert into G_TRAN(EQUIP_ID, ORG_ID, TG_ID, TYPE_CODE, TRAN_NAME, INST_ADDR, INST_DATE, PLATE_CAP, RUN_STATUS_CODE, MODEL_NO, RV_HV, RV_MV, RV_LV, RC_HV, RC_MV, RC_LV, PR_CODE, LASTTIME_STAMP) values(#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{plateCap,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{runStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvHv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvMv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvLv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcHv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcMv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcLv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update G_TRAN set ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TG_ID = #{tgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TYPE_CODE = #{tranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_NAME = #{tranName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INST_ADDR = #{instAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INST_DATE = #{instDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PLATE_CAP = #{plateCap,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RUN_STATUS_CODE = #{runStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL_NO = #{tranModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RV_HV = #{rvHv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RV_MV = #{rvMv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RV_LV = #{rvLv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RC_HV = #{rcHv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RC_MV = #{rcMv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RC_LV = #{rcLv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PR_CODE = #{pr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTTIME_STAMP = #{lastTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where EQUIP_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select EQUIP_ID, ORG_ID, TG_ID, TYPE_CODE, TRAN_NAME, INST_ADDR, INST_DATE, PLATE_CAP, RUN_STATUS_CODE, MODEL_NO, RV_HV, RV_MV, RV_LV, RC_HV, RC_MV, RC_LV, PR_CODE, LASTTIME_STAMP from G_TRAN order by ORG_ID, TG_ID, EQUIP_ID
select count(1) as CNT from G_TRAN
